dict.acceptation: 国家的；国务的，公务的；正式的；

sent.orig: Why do I get an assert when I access the state machine from a state destructor?
sent.trans: 为什么我从state的析构函数中访问状态机时会得到一个断言？

sent.orig: This step consists of initializing a lua_State structure by calling lua_open.
sent.trans: 这一步主要是调用lua_open初始化lua_State结构体。

sent.orig: Some system-provided variables, such as STATE, are restricted to read-only access.
sent.trans: 一些系统提供的变数，像是STATE是被限制为唯读的。

sent.orig: The State Organ, the organization to perform state power, plays an important role in state development.
sent.trans: 国家机关是国家权力的行使机构，对于国家发展有着重要的作用。

sent.orig: The presidential rates presidential race is decided by state state-by-state tally of electoral factselectoral votes.
sent.trans: 总统的竞选是被每州的选举的得分决定的。
